thread.title: Beer volumes up but Heineken downs growth target

title: Beer volumes up but Heineken downs growth target
text:
Beer volumes up but Heineken downs growth target 1:45pm GMT - 01:30 
Heineken, the world's second-largest brewer, says its operating margin in 2018 will grow below the rate it had guided for between 2014 and 2017, citing a volatile market environment and an acquisition in Brazil. Ciara Lee reports
